messages.messageBody:
Try these links;

http://home.earthlink.net/~steinrl/sageo.htm

http://pages.prodigy.net/tlbuck/tsuka/tsuka.htm

Rich Stein's Japanese Sword Index is always a great place to start sword
related searches...
-t

the

Shawn,
Here is a good page on Tsuka Wrapping as well as a Diagram on how to
tie the Sageo.. http://pages.prodigy.net/tlbuck/tsuka/tsuka.htm

Hope this helps..

Mike
